1.content:
Cory is a skinny 10th grader. Everybody thinks he is very cool because hes a loner. All of the scrawny girls around Cory make him sad. He wishes they were rounder and is prepared to do something about it. His master plan is to start dating a girl, then slowly fatten them up. Once they are big enough he will break up with them, but still keep making them grow in other ways. His parents are rich and pay very little attention to their son and daughter. Cory's sister, Raney, is in 8th grade. She was the first girl to be part of his master plan. She used to be a thin, short teen who never gained weight. Now her belly stuck out a few inches from her body and her once slender thighs rub together as she waddles around. People at school are just realizing how big she has gotten. This could be a good thing because her crush, Will, is just realizing he likes big bellies. Will she gain for love, or does she hate her extra weight?
Other Girls:
Penelope: Cory's best friend. She has had a crush on him since 4th grade. She was always thin and tall. Her mother wants her little girl to become her butterball baby. She always tries to get Penelope to eat more, but Penelope wants to maintain her figure for Cory. 10th grade.
Claudia: This girl is as thin as a twig, but for some reason has a small bulge for a belly. Cory wants to make that bulge get bigger. Claudia dances, but also eats alot. 10th grade.
Lane: Although not as thin as Claudia, Lane is still very thin. Lane always seems to be eating and doesnt do any sports, but she still never gains weight. Maybe Cory can get her to eat more, or maybe her metabolism will slow down. 10th grade.
Kayla: Raney's friend. This girl is normal sized. She was the only one that noticed Raney's growing size. However, she didnt tell her friend because she liked Raney's big belly. Will she get her own, or make Raney's grow? 8th grade.
Emma: This tall and slender girl always pretends to hate Cory. However inside she sort-of likes the loner. Will she tell him about her feelings, or keep them locked up? 10th grade.
Marry: One of the heavier girls in 9th grade, Mary is a little pudgey, and it shows in her butt and thighs. She used to be fatter when Cory first met her, but now she has lost the weight.
Lyra: Raney's best friend. She spends most of her time at Cory's house. Because of this, the skinny girl was plumped up along with her friend. However, unlike with Raney, Lyra's belly was all the grew. Now her round tummy sticks out even more than Raney's.
Now for the final question in this chapter, has Cory started yet?
1.title: First the characters

11.content:
Maybe Cory has already fattened Lane, Claudia, and Emma.

First Lane:
Lane walked into school. A few days ago Cory broke up with her. They had been going out for a month now. She is still pretty sad and every night since the break up, she had binged on ice cream. However, she didnt notice how much bigger she had gotten. Some of the weight made her belly grow to a larger than normal size. The rest of the weight made her flat chest blossom. All she thought of this was she had finally hit puberty. However, she had noticed her clothes were getting tighter.
Then Claudia:
A week after Cory broke up with Lane, he asked her friend Claudia out. Claudia hadnt noticed Lane's growth, so she said yes and they started dating. During the time she was dating Cory her entire body had plumped up, especially her belly. The skinny girl hadnt even noticed because Cory bought her clothes that were the same as her's, but bigger. When Cory finally broke up with her after a month, she was about as big as Lane, but the fat was more evenly spread out. Claudia didnt care as much as Lane when Cory broke up with her because she was about to break up with him.
Emma was next:
Emma was working up the courage to ask Cory out. Now was a good time because he had recently broke up with Claudia. Everybody knows Claudia and Lane are both fat now, but everyone thinks their giant appetites finally caught up with them. Emma believed maybe Cory was looking for a girl who would love him. Just before Emma was going to ask Cory out, he came over and asked her out. They went to a buffet. Cory made sure Emma ate more than normal. This was how Cory started fattening up a girl who actually liked him. During the time Cory and Emma were dating, Emma's flat belly started filling out. Out of all the girls Cory had fattened, Emma's belly grew the most. By the time Cory broke up with Emma, her belly hung down almost as far as her knees. Emma took the break up very hard, and for the next week she didnt go to school. Instead she sat at home and binged on ice cream. This made her belly stretch to a larger size. She now hates Cory.
11.title: Maybe he fattened these girls up?

111.content:
Cory than set his sights upon the figure of Marry, the previously fat girl who to Cory's dismay had lost most of her precious weight. Recently Mary started to monitor her diet and exercise more she even going so far as joining the girls' soccer team. Cory became determined to get Mary back up to her original weight and even higher. Cory enjoyed the image of Mary nice and fat as he approached the unsuspecting girl.

"Hey Mary you doing anything tonight?" Cory asked. "Oh yeah I got soccer practice." she replied. "Well wouldn't you rather go out with me instead?" Cory said. Mary than blushed at Cory's proposal for she recently became attracted to him. "Well I guess I could skip practice just once." she responded. "Awesome I'll take you out to eat my treat." Cory said. "Great I can't wait." she said. "Cool, see you then." Cory said. "Bye!" Mary said full of joy. The two parted with Cory devilishly rubbing his hands together filled with angst for what will unfold later.

Cory had a wallet filled with cash and a girl under his arm as he approached a burger joint. "Allright here we are, I hope you brought your appetite." Cory said. As Mary ordered Cory kept coercing her into ordering more. "A small!? oh no make that a extra large, don't worry its all on me. Feel free and order the milkshake. What you've never tried those before, I'll order you some. Here try this. Use this sauce, don't be modest you really need to smother it." Cory sat in delight as he watched Mary stuff her face with the greasy food, finding the sight of her fattening before his very eyes appealing. "Uhh so full" Mary moaned with a little grease on her lips. "So do I know how to treat a girl or what" Cory said as he walked the engorged girl home with his arm around her swollen waist.

As Cory returned home he was encountered by his sister Raney, his first test subject, who was eating some potato chips. "munch munch so another girl huh?" his sister said with a mouthful of chips. "Yep" Cory answered bluntly. "You're gonna end up fattening every girl around you at this rate." Raney said smirking. "That's the plan" Cory said. "At first I was mad at you but I've actually grown used to this belly" she said looking down grabbing her tummy, "and getting to eat all I want is pretty sweet, plus that hunk Will is noticing me. My friends also seem okay especially Kayla who seems to enjoy my figure and new habits, even Lyra is enjoying this and she's fatter than me. And I can't forget these girls" Raney said groping her augmented breasts. "Well your welcome now lets get you something to eat dear sister." Cory said rubbing his sister's belly.
111.title: Continue

1111.content:
Not only did Cory plan on increasing Mary's waistline through overeating but also preventing her from engaging in physical activity. "Hey Mary did you have fun last night?" Cory asked. "Yeah but I ate alot." Mary said. "Eh who cares you look fine. Here I got you a present." Cory said handing Mary a huge box of chocolates. "Oh thanks." she said. "Those are super expensive too." he said. "Oh wow" Mary said overwhelmed. "Go one and try one." Cory pleaded. "Uh I'm not really hungry right now." Mary said. "Oh come on please" Cory begged. "Well okay..." Mary took a bite and was bombarded by the most savory chocolate she ever had. "Oh my god! this is so good!"Mary said quickly eating another one. "Well glad you like them" he said while Mary continued to devour the candy.

Later at lunch, Cory had another surprise for his new girlfriend. "Hey babe eating lunch?" "Yes just a sandwich and banana." Mary said. "Oh well I hope you saved room cause I made you a lunch." Cory said handing her a huge bag of food. Mary opened it and saw it filed with cookies, chips, and a huge meatball sub. "Oh uh thanks Cory" Mary said somewhat hesitant. Meanwhile Lane, Claudia, and Emma stared from afar. "Oh look he's got another girl munch." said Lane. "Yeah buying her gifts omph" said Claudia. "SLURP whatever I don't care" said Emma. All three girls developed tendencies to eat their sorrows away and consequently have become quite fat like Cory's sister and her friends.

"Hey Mary you going to soccer practice tonight?" Cory asked. "Uhgg I'm a little too full to run around today." Mary said rubbing her growing belly. "Oh in that case come on over to my house we can order a pizza." Cory suggested to Mary who accepted his offer. "Alright shes eating like a pig and even skipping practice" Cory thought as a grin formed on his face. Cory noticed Mary's clothes looking tight on her as bulges began to form. "Hmm I better deal with that soon.

Thanks to Cory's affluence he could get anything he needed to secure Mary's weight gain even buying her clothes. "Here Mary I got you this new dress." Cory said unveiling a breathtaking dress to Mary who was awestruck. "Oh Cory! its beautiful!" Mary said totally anxious to put it on and no longer aware of her 'shrunken' clothes. "Anything for my sweetheart." Cory said.

Soon to Cory's delight, Mary become quite fat so Cory...
1111.title: the next day

11111.content:
"Wha wha! you- you're breaking up with me?!" Mary said to Cory at a restaurant. "Yeeeaaahh sorry but I feel like its just not working out. I feel like I'm the only one who contributes, I mean I really like you but I'm just not sure you're the right one." Cory said. "But but but..." Mary stammered. "Hey lets just be friends." Cory gently said walking off. Mary, nearly sobbing, called for the waiter and ordered a massive amount of food. As the food arrived Mary immediately dove into it, scarfing down the fattening substance whimpering as she mourned for Cory. Since she started dating Cory she quit soccer, totally quit exercising, developed a huge appetite, fell into the habit of constantly eating, and consumes loads of junk food. Overall she doubled her body weight.

The next day at school Cory was at his locker when he was approached by his good friend Penelope. "Hey Cory" she said. "Oh hey Penelope" Cory replied. "So uh I noticed Mary was eating in the cafeteria crying did you break up with Mary." she said. "Yeah it just didn't work out." he said. Penelope tried to hide her elation "Oh that's too bad. Soooo you wanna do something tonight?" Penelope suggested. "Sure, I'll take you out to dinner tonight." Cory said keeping his "true" intentions clandestine. "Awesome, I'm looking forward to it." Penelope said walking off. "I knew he'd break up with Mary, she got fat like all the others. That won't happen to me." Penelope thought to herself. Meanwhile Cory watched Penelope walk away staring at her slender body, imagining it fat, becoming anxious to watch her gain.

Cory arrives at Penelope's house to pick her up. Cory knocks on the door to have it be answered by Penelope's mother. "Oh hey Cory!" answered her mother. "Um hi, I'm here for Penelope" Cory said nervously gazing at his date's mom. The woman looked like her daughter but she was very fat with a huge belly, thick legs, a wide bottom, flabby arms, and massive breasts spilling out of her low cut sun dress. "Oh come here give me a hug" the woman said wrapping her squishing arms around Cory pressing him into her soft belly. "Penelope! your dates here!" the milf said. "COMING!" Penelope yelled. "Take care of my little pumpkin Cory, make sure she gets a good meal, she's a little too thin for my tastes." she said winking at Cory. "Oh I get you, don't worry, I'll make sure she gets a good meal." Cory said returning a wink. "Hey Cory" Penelope said wearing a mini skirt and tank top. "Oh there she is, now you two go have fun." the milf said. "So Penelope, how bout we go to a ..."Cory said
11111.title: moved to another girl

111111.content:
Cory knew how he'd fatten Penelope up, he'd do it in a subtle manner feeding her food with astonishingly high calories while creating the illusion of high class dining. Afterall what girl would resists such lavish pampering. "Here we are." Cory said standing in front of one of the city's most fancy restaurants. Penelope was awestruck at Cory's generosity. In the restaurant they were given free bread and butter, Cory of course constantly convincing her to eat more and getting her to indulge with the butter. When it came to ordering Cory knew precisely what to get for Penelope. Cory had done his research and found the most rich foods with amazingly high calories and fat contents. He ordered appetizers and made sure Penelope ate the bulk of it. "Oh this is just so good, I feel like a greedy girl eating all this." Penelope said reaching for more appetizers. "Oh no please indulge, I've had this before." Cory offered. Then for dinner Cory ordered for Penelope, getting her a rich steak drenched in an unbelievably rich sauce with fattening sides. "MMMM! this is so good, I'm definately going to let you order for me from now on." Penelope said as Cory smirked. When dessert came, Cory forced not one but two dishes on her, a belly filling chocolate cake slice and a heavy slice of creamy cheese cake. "Uh I'm so full but those look so yummy, I can't resist." his date said. Penelope ate everything Cory bought her, consuming an inhuman amount of calories, a great start for the girl's weight gain. Best of all, Penelope was completely oblivious to the fattening since Cory disguised it as fine dining.

Cory walked Penelope to her door were her mother looked on with excitment. "So how was it?" her mother asked anxiously. "Great Cory treated me to some fine dining. hiccup. Although I think I ate too much." Penelope said clutching her gut. Her mother's eyes lit up as she saw her daughter's engorged belly. "Oh its nothing to fret about honey, all that matters is that you have a good time. Thank you Cory for treating my girl so well." the milf said. "It was my pleasure which I hope to indulge myself in again." Cory said winking at the encouraging mother.
111111.title: high class restaurant

1113.content:
A year later, Corey had accomplished every thing he wanted, now all of the girls who were scrawny have plumped into obesity. The school's female sports teams have dissolved as all of the girls are too fat to participate. The school also has experienced a rise in eating during class as the girls lost all resistance to their developed hunger. Corey now gleefully interacts with overweight girls on a daily basis, from bumping into their extra flesh in the halls to getting squished between them in line, to seeing them waddle and jiggle.

At first the girls were filled with resentment towards Corey for making them fat but over time they grew fond of the changes and even more fond of Corey. The girls accept Corey's fetish and condole his actions, even when they see him dating a thin girl to fatten her up. Corey now acquired a harem of fat girls fighting one another for his affection, going as far as actively fattening up. Even Raney and her friends, who are now in highschool, enjoy Corey's modifications as they continue their gaining. Currently Corey is facing frequent attempts of seduction by all of the fat girls sometimes resulting in outlandish finales. As it stands Corey isn't seeing any girl exclusively but does enjoy fraternizing with all of them even though each girl yearns to become the sole possessor of Corey's heart.

The girls' gaining continues....

121.content:
"Morning, Cory!" Penelope beamed as she sat next to him in Social Studies. A large blush was creeping to her cheeks.

"Hey," Cory said absent-mindlessly.

Sure, Penelope was his closest friend since fourth grade, and it wasn't that he hated her or anything, but he had "bigger" plans on his mind. Cory had only recently come to terms with the fact that he liked bigger women, really liked them. More importantly, he didn't just like big girls, but wanted to be the one to make them bigger. Nothing thrilled him more than feeding a girl until she was too stuffed to move, rubbing and caring for their round belly as if they were pregnant, and if he got his way, he'd stuff them until they looked it. The thought of making a girl develop roll upon roll of love-handles drove him wild. And he couldn't even begin to express how a woman with large hips made him feel.

Today, he had decided he was sick of just looking at pictures and videos online. He needed to be a part of the real action. His plan was foolproof. He had all the money to engage in his new pet project, so there would be no problems there. He would find some poor girl to fatten to his liking. Of course, what would make it all the more fun would be that they wouldn't know about it. The fantasy was always so much better when they were blissfully unaware of how big they were getting. But, who would be his first "victim?"

Looking around the classroom, he saw a lot of good candidates. There were a few girls who were already pretty fat to begin with. They wouldn't be that hard to work with; a good starting out project, he thought. Plus, while they might catch on to his plan sooner, they wouldn't care. There were some others who were on the chubby side, too. They would be fun. They were probably self-conscious of their bodies, and he could bank on their insecurities to get them to eat. Then there were the super-thin girls. They were all bitches in class anyway who looked down their noses at everybody. It could serve them right to be taken down a peg. Plus, they'd be so into his money, they'd do anything for him.

No, while all these choices seemed great, he wanted something special. "So, I was wondering," Penelope continued. Apparently, she had been carrying an entire conversation with him hardly listening. "Want to hang out or something this weekend."

"Look, Penelope, I-"

But as he turned to face her, he saw it; the perfect match. Why hadn't he seen it before? Penelope would be the perfect candidate. She was incredibly thin, which made his fantasies go wild. He liked the idea of a real challenge; bringing a girl from a twig to a blimp. It was no secret that she had a crush on him, and that she did keep herself so thin to try and impress him. Oh, how wrong she was. That would mean she might put up some resistance, but it was the chase, not so much the end goal that mattered, and a little resistance would make it fun. So much potential with her. Better yet, she was sweet and innocent, and would hardly catch on to what was really going on. And in the grand scheme of things, while he wasn't looking for love out of this, he did want someone who was at least tolerable. Penelope was perfect. An evil, Grinch-like smile spread across his face. Time to set the plan in motion.

"Actually, Penny," he said, "I was thinking, or actually hoping, would you like to go out on a date?"

Her eyes lit up. "Oh yes! Yes, that would be...uh, well, that's fine I suppose," she said, trying to play it cool.

Oh this would be too easy. "Great! How about, Saturday night, my place? We'll try cooking together."

Penelope was turning beet-red. "That sounds really romantic, I mean fun."

"It's a date then."
121.title: A Plumper Penelope

1251.content:
Cory was walking through the halls, thinking about that which would perplex a boy his age, girls, boobs, mini skirts, bikinis. Although Cory's mind differed from the typical boy as he favored girls of the hefty variety. Cory always appreciated girls with extra padding, finding himself staring at fat girls when he saw them. Unfortunately Cory's school was utterly bereft of fat girls, all of them being weight watching twigs. There was one exception, Mary, a girl from a younger grade who was the only fat girl he went to school with. She was such a plump child but he was too young to enjoy her weight. Mary was a cute pudgy girl who constantly ate.and avoided physical activity.

But that was the past. Currently Cory stands in dismay at his locker seeing Mary chat with the other skinny girls. Suddenly you are joined by your friend Penelope. "Hey Cory." greeted the affable girl. "oh hey." he lethargically replied. "Hey is something wrong? You seem a little down." Penelope inquired. "Oh its nothing you'd care about." answered the troubled lad. "Well okay then...Whoa is that Mary? She's so skinny! I can't believe she lost all that weight!" Penelope's words riddle Cory with sorrow. How he desparately yearned for her once abundant curves only to be faced with another skin and bones girl.

Cory and Penelope were than joined by Claudia and Lane both of whom were eating snacks. "Hey you two talking about that 9th grader Mary's weight loss?" asked Claudia. "Yeah its so impressive." Penelope stated. "Yeah that girl started a strict diet and started vigorous exercise regiments." informed Claudia still chewing. "Gah I hate exercise thank god for my fast metabolism." Lane confessed. "Well good for her for sticking to her regiment. It can be hard sometimes, I would know especially with my mom around always trying to veer me away from my fitness routine with offerings of food but I know she's just trying to get me fat like her." Penelope divulged giving Cory a brilliant idea, get Mary to regain all her beautiful weight. He would use all of his assets and abilities to return Mary to her former fat glory.

"Excuse me ladies." Cory said walking over to Mary. Separating Mary from her friends, Cory asked her out to eat after school. Being a older student, Mary couldn't refuse and whole heartedly accepted the prestigious offer. Overwhelmed by the older boy's charm, Mary agreed without a second's thought upsetting the balance of her stringent health schedule. Normally Mary would go for a jog after school but Cory took her to...

Raney was busy eating eating a box of donuts, and as she finished her 3rd donut, she said, "You were a crafty bastard, you know that? Ya made me into the chubby chick I am today. I like it."

Raney said, "Well..."

125312.content:
"Well as long as you provide me with tasty food, I'll continue gaining." Raney said grabbing another donut. "All right, you won't regret this sis, I'll treat you like a princess." an elated Cory professed. Cory than rushed to the freezer pulling out a tub of ice cream. "Here sis let me feed you." Cory asked. "Sure" Raney replied brushing her donuts aside. "Now say ahhh." Cory said lifting a spoonful of the creamy substance to his little sister's lips. Spoonful after spoonful filled Raney's belly with the sweet dessert tightening her pants. Cory noticed Raney's developing discomfort "Oh let me help you." Cory unbuttoned her pants causing her to let out a satisfied moan. Cory was than confronted with the sight of his sister's engorged belly. "Here sis feed yourself I have to do this." Cory said handing Raney the spoon while he placed his hands upon the swollen stomach of his sister. Unable to resist the temptation, Cory fondled the ice cream filled belly "Oh you're becoming a cute little tubbo Raney." Cory said as he rubbed his face against Raney's belly. "Hey easy there Cory, I agreed to let you feed me not to be your lover!" Raney said. "I know but I can't help it." Cory replied. "Well all right you can continue until I finish the ice cream." a blushing Raney compromised. "You''re so generous sis" Cory stated as he continued fondling the expanding tummy.

As the feeding concluded, Raney went into her room while, Cory made prepartions for his little sister's development.
125312.title: "What the hell.  Sure, I'll continue!"

1253122.content:
After a week of Cory's feeding sessions, Raney had put on a significant amount of weight. At school, she caught attention from her fellow classmates and a few bewildered teachers as well. Raney was such a skinny girl who possessed healthy habits suddenly made a 180. Raney had become a fat girl in an alarmingly short time. Her rail thin legs thickened with soft meat, her arms once toothpick developed jiggly bags of fat on them, her flat chest had bloomed into large squeezable orbs tempting all the boys, her belly once slim had ballooned into a fat gut which hung over her skirt, and her ass once firm had widened into two quaking globes. Raney's body wasn't the only thing that changed, Raney developed an insatiable appetite along with a taste for salty greasy foods and a strong appreciation for desserts.

Currently Raney was stuffing her face during lunchtime with a huge lunch specifically designed for her by her ever loving brother. She was scarfing down a frosted brownie as her friends Lyra and Kayla approached her. "Hey Raney how's it going?" Kayla asked. "Nom omph pretty good" Raney responded as she swallowed her food while reaching for her milkshake to wash it down with. "Um Raney.. um I'll just say it Raney you've gotten fat!" Lyra said. "Duh" Raney responded digging into a piece of cake. "You know you're getting fat! Why?" asked Kayla. "Cory likes it and I get delicious food so..." "So!? Look at what you're eating!" Lyra interrupted the feasting girl. "Yeah sweets for lunch." replied a jolly Raney. "so Cory's doing this to you." Kayla said. "Yeah its probably some fetish or something." Raney replied. "But look at what he has done to you." Lyra said. "Yeah he's given me boobs." Raney said grabbing her augmented chest "Thanks to these I get looks from guys now, even Will. Plus I get treated like a queen, last night Cory hand feed me cake while rubbing my belly." Raney's words enticed Kayla. "No way can gettingfat be that good." Lyra said. "Hey you should come over tonight and see for yourself, I'm sure Cory would love to feed you two." Raney offered. The girls accepted the offer, Kayla was excited whereas Lyra was a bit hesitant.

Later that night Lyra and Kayla accompanied Raney to her next feeding session with Cory. "Hey Cory make room for two more." Raney said. Cory was delighted with what he saw, two more skinny girls to fatten up. "Oh you brought your friends cool, I'll order some pizzas." Cory said grabbing the phone.
1253122.title: a week later

choices: Cory is talking to the principal
12533.content:
It has been two weeks since Cory had started experimenting on his younger sister, attempting to increase her weight. To his amusement, he was successful. His little sister, Raney, used to be a thin girl who never gained weight. People used to compliment her on her slim figure, how unlike other girls who'd get alittle pudgy from snacking Raney kept her discipline. But now...

"Cory! I need more chips!"

"Coming" Cory happily answered grabbing a large bag of greasy potato chips and a carton of cookies.

"And Cookies too!" Her added yell proved Cory's foresight.

Cory brought the snacks in the tv room where his sister was. Raney was sitting on the floor amidst scattered wrappers and crumple bags of snacks, her eyes glued to the television.

"Here's your snacks sis."

Raney immediately snatched the goodies from her brother's hand, quickly opening them.

"Thanks" she said after shoving a few in her mouth.

Cory smiled from her actions. Here was his "thin" little sister, lazing about, watching tv, and stuffing herself with tons of snacks. Apathetic about her belly spilling out from under her tank top and indifferent about her shorts digging into her thighs, which were getting rather chunky. The young lady's arms had begun to jiggle and her breasts have been swelling up all due to her weight gain. Her butt was becoming plushy making sitting on it for extended periods of time all the easier.

DING DONG

Cory had to cut away from his little sister's exhibition to answer the door. It was Lyra, Raney's best friend, and she was looking a bit portly as well.

"Hey Cory, is Raney home?"

"Yeah sure she's watching tv." Cory said welcoming her in.

"Oh watching tv again." an unenthusiastic Lyra spoke.

Cory led Lyra to Raney.

"Hey Raney want to go out?" asked the best friend.

"No I'm watching this." Raney muffled with a mouth a chips pointing at the program.

"Oh" Lyra was disappointed by Raney's reply.

"Hey sit next to me and watch. It's a really good show. Come on." Raney insisted. "Cory get Lyra some snacks."

Raney was becoming a rather bad influence on her friend, who like herself was getting fat. Against her wishes, Lyra sat down and started snacking, her belly covering her lap. Seeing Lyra submit to Raney's sloth aroused Cory. Fattening one girl was great but multiple girls. Cory was reveling in the display of inactivity before him. The sight of Raney's chunky legs and the view of Lyra's gut filled Cory with pleasure, and ambition.

He needed more.
More than just one girl, or even five.
He needed something huge.

It was at that moment that Cory decided that he needed to fatten the entire female student body. Given his immense wealth it should be possible. But how could he pull off such an endeavor? With his sister he got her hooked on a tv show causing her to spend all her time sitting infront of the tv no longer participating in any physical activity. As she helplessly watched Cory supplied her with the most unhealthiest of snacks. As a result his thin little sister packed on the pounds.

Cory then spent the night concocting a plan to fatten every last girl in his school.

The next day at school...
12533.title: Fatten up every girl in school

13.content:
If you want more, how about these characters.

Becky: She was a pretty fat girl, even before meeting with Cory. She has an interest in books and would love a good read from time to time. Becky also has a sweet tooth so once she's around sweets, she can't help but eat them. It was because of her sweet tooth Becky's fat, but she actually doesn't mind her fat and sometimes thinks about getting fatter. 10th grade

Alexia: Alexia is a thin girl who is sort of a jock. She really likes doing sports with her favorite being roller skating. Even if she's interested in Cory, she's not really into gaining weight. 10th grade

Marisa: Like Lane, Marisa always seems to be eating yet not gaining weight. So in earlier times, she was a pretty thin girl. But when she got around to the 10th grade, her metabolism was slowing down and is starting to gain weight from her feeding. What will mean for Cory when her picks her?

Rachel: She's a pretty easygoing artist. Rachel always wants to draw at some points and has her notepad and drawing tools to do that. She's always like to go with the flow and doesn't mind any changes even if it's her getting fat.

So will Cory fatten one of those girls for now, or something else?
13.title: some other girls

choices: Corey impresses Alexia with his athletic prowess
132.content:
Corey was standing by himself staring at the various girls. All of whom were far too skinny. Corey hated that. He wanted to attend school surrounded by fat girls. Girls who'd be more interested in eating sweets rather than kicking the soccer ball around. Girls who'd disavow restraint during lunch. Girls who'd appreciate owning large breasts. Girls who'd talk about how fat they're getting and be happy about it.

But no.

Corey was stranded in a desert of emaciated twigs. The mere sight of their undersized figures angered him. Corey knew he had to do something, something to expand the girls. What was stopping him? He was incredibly wealthy, he could easily supply every girl with a plethora of fattening nourishment. Gifted with a cunning charisma, he could also deceive girls into lifestyles that facilitated weight gain.

Yes. A future filled with fat girls was truly in his reach.

It was then that his gaze fell upon the jock that was Alexia. A girl sports enthusiast, how repulsive! She should be stuffing her face instead of chasing after a ball. Fattening a girl as fit as her would be a real accomplishment. A triumph of feminine curves over androgynous thinness.

Corey than concocted a plan to plump Alexia up nice and big. With a relentless determination, Corey set his plan into action and approached the girl who was playing around with a soccer ball.

"Hey! Mind if I join you?"
132.title: Alexia

info.brief_description: Cory is a skinny, cool guy. At his school, most girls are scrawny.
info.description:
Cory is a skinny 9th grader. Most people think hes cool because he rarely talks to anyone. However he has a new plan Also he likes big girls.
Rules:
keep it pg13 (these people arent 18 yet)
nothing sexual
The girls dont know they have gained weight till its over
Please try to keep an other option
no immobility
natural gaining only
only girls in 8th grade or higher
no death
try to make the chapters long
